roleset.name: think about, as a judge

role.descr: thought, thing deliberated on; usually: on/upon/about

example.name: only intransitive
example.text: The Senate will deliberate behind closed doors today and is scheduled to vote on the impeachment tomorrow.

example.name: transitive
example.text: It 's still too early [*PRO*] to confirm , that is we need [*]to deliberate between ourselves on whether we see these ideas that [*T*-2] were raised [*-3] here , as a basis for an end game .
example.arg: whether we see these ideas that [*T*-2] were raised [*-3] here , as a basis for an end game

example.name: Nominal rel: deliberation
example.text: The election was also a result of the careful deliberation of the Taiwanese public on their immediate interests !

roleset.note: DELIBERATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deliberate' based on wsj; nominal 'deliberation' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls correspond-36.1, meet-36.3-1. (from deliberate.01-v)
DELIBERATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from deliberation.01-n)
